title: About Me
paragraphs: Hi, I'm Nat√°n. I like building software that solves real problems and feels neat, clear, and maintainable. I really enjoy the process, understanding what's needed, thinking of a simple solution, and turning it into something that works well.

I'm driven by curiosity and continuous learning. I'm always exploring new ideas, tools, or ways to do things better. I feel comfortable adapting, asking questions, researching, and breaking whatever it takes to understand it.

Outside of code, I've been a musician since I was a kid. Music helps me stay creative, unwind, and see things from a different angle. I also love animals; playing with "Clarita" always recharges my batteries.
I'm looking for projects and opportunities where I can truly add value, work with good people, and continue growing both technically and personally.
